definitions.title: prep.,
definitions.body: circuit, round about:—cstr. [[סְבִיב]] † Am 3:11; pl. cstr. [[סְבִיבֵי]] † Je 32:44, Je 33:13, sf. [[סְבִיבֶיְ]] etc. (10 t.), much oftener [[סְבִיבוֹת]] Ex 7:24 + 22 t., [[סְבִיבוֹתַי]], [[תֶיְ]]-, etc., De 17:14, etc. (48 t.):—

definitions.title: subst.
definitions.body: 1Ch 11:8 [[מן־המלוא וְעַד־הַסָּבִיב]] and to the parts round about.

definitions.title: adv. acc.
definitions.body: [[סָבִיב]] (in) a circuit, i.e. round about, Ge 23:17 [[בְּכָל־גְּבֻלוֹ סָבִיב]] Ex 19:12, Ex 25:11, Ex 25:24, Ex 25:25, Le 1:5, Le 1:11 [[עַל הַמִּזְבֵּחַ]] [[סָבִיב]], Ju Jdg 20:29, 1Ki 3:1, 1Ki 5:11, Ps 3:7 [[שָׁתוּ עָלָָי]] ´[[אֲשֶׁר ס]], Ps 12:8, Ps 34:8 + oft.; sometimes doubled, for the sake of emphasis, 2Ch 4:3, Ez Eze 8:10 ´[[ס]] ´[[עַל הַקִּיר ס]], Eze 37:2, Eze 40:5 and oft. in Ez Eze 40–Eze 43.

definitions.title: prep.:
definitions.body: (a) Psalm Am 3:11 [[חַר וּסְבִיב הָאָרֶץ]] distress, and that in the circuit of (= round about) the land (but rd. prob. with SyrVer [[יְסׂבֵב]] will encircle). (b) ´[[סָבִיב לְ]] Ex 16:13, Ex 40:33, Nu 1:50, Nu 1:53, Nu 2:2, Ju Jdg 7:21, 1Ki 6:5, 1Ki 18:32, 1Ki 18:35, Ez Eze 41:10, Eze 14:16, Job 19:12, Ps 34:8, Ps 78:28, Ps 125:2, Ps 125:2 [[סָבִיב לְעַמּוֹ]] ´[[י]], Ps 128:3, Ct So 3:7, Na 3:8. (c) strangely, [[סָבִיב אֵת]] † 1Ki 6:5 (om. LXX), Ez Eze 43:17.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[מִסָּבִיב]]:42, from round about, from every side, Ez Eze 16:33, Eze 16:37, Eze 23:22, Eze 37:21, but usu. ([[מִן]]

Je 6:25, Je 20:3, Je 20:10, Je 46:5, Je 49:29, Ps 31:14, cf. definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: † [[סְבִיבִים]]: (a) in masc. sense, those round about, Ps 76:12 [[כָּל־סְבִיבָיו יׁבִילוּ שַׁי]], Ps 89:8, Je 48:17, Je 48:39. definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: Ex 7:24 [[סְבִיבׂת הַיְאׂר]] lit. (in) the circuits of the Nile = round about the Nile, Nu 11:24, Nu 11:31, Nu 11:32, Nu 35:2 [[סְבִיבׂתֵיהֶם]], Ju Jdg 7:18, 1Sa 26:5, 1Sa 26:7, 2Ki 6:17 [[סביבׂת אלישׁע]], Ps 18:12, Ps 27:6 [[על אׂיְבַי סביבותי]], etc.; oft. idiom. preceded by [[אשׁר]], as Ge 33:5 [[הערים אשׁר סביבותיהם]] Ge 41:48, Le 25:44, Nu 16:34, De 6:14, De 13:8, De 17:14, De 21:2 +. In the same sense [[מִסְּבִיבוֹתָם]] † Ez Eze 28:26.
